snippet: Horse racing officials said they had not yet seen the Horseracing Integrity and Safety Act, which is expected to be introduced to Congress next week.
lead_paragraph: Horse racing officials said they had not yet seen the Horseracing Integrity and Safety Act, which is expected to be introduced to Congress next week.

headline.seo: Racing Industry Eager to See Bill Allowing Usada Oversight
headline.main: Racing Industry Eager to See Bill Allowing Usada Oversight
headline.print_headline: Racing Industry Eager to See Bill Allowing Usada Oversight
